metro.WindowControls

Class ActionObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Checkbox, ColorBar, InputField, Label, List, Window

    public class ActionObservable
extends java.lang.Object
    Every window control (or other classes) should inherit this class to be able to send information about state changes, button clicks, etc. to other classes in a clean and simple way.
    Author:
    hauke

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<ActionObserver> _listOfObserver 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActionObservable()
      Creates the list of all observers of this observable object.
